item.title: [Python] Let's put in Glances (Python command line monitoring tool).
item.description: I just picked it up on TL on Twitter, so I put it in. https://pypi.python.org/pypi/Glances -A cross-platform curses-based monitoring tool The reason is that the screenshots in pipy were good ^^; Install CentOS provides rpm so you can install it with yum. (Python-glance-2012.2.4-3.el6.noarch) In my case, I added it to CentOS 6.5 of Vagrant. (Not yum, easy-install or pip can be easily entered) Try to start Just type the command.
